name: Ferroseed
description: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.

abilities.name: Iron Barbs
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage.  This ability functions identically to rough skin.
abilities.description: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.
